amendment.description: To strengthen civil liberties protections, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3916 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3916 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Leahy. (consideration: CR S10338-10339; text: CR S10339) To strengthen civil liberties protections, and for other purposes.
